title: Cyprus incorporation timeline and milestones
author: abdelrahman
summary: Proposing Q2 2024 for formal incorporation with 10% equity split among initial members.
content: Team, I've been working with our legal counsel on the Cyprus incorporation structure. Key points: Q2 2024 timeline, 10% equity split, â‚¬50K per member contribution.

title: PLG vs Sales-led: What's working in 2024?
author: leila
summary: Sharing insights from recent pivot from pure PLG to hybrid model. 3x improvement in enterprise deals.
content: Just wrapped Q4 analysis. Hybrid model results: 3x enterprise deal size, 45-day sales cycle, 8-month CAC payback.

title: Supabase vs Firebase: 6-month comparison
author: fawzi
summary: Detailed comparison after running both in production. Supabase wins on cost, Firebase on ecosystem.
content: 6-month data: Supabase $450/mo (70% less), 45ms p95. Moving fully to Supabase for new projects.

title: Post-mortem: Failed AdTech investment
author: marcus
summary: Sharing lessons from a $250K write-off. Key issue: founder-market fit, not product-market fit.
content: Tough lesson: Founder-market fit > product-market fit. New criteria: 5+ years domain expertise required.

title: Engineering hiring: Reverse interview method
author: sarah
summary: Reduced mis-hires by 60% with this one change to our interview process.
content: Candidates critique our codebase instead. Results: 60% fewer mis-hires, 2-week productivity.
